resources.string: Protect your eyes by maintaining a healthy distance from your screen. VisionProtect uses advanced face detection to ensure you\'re not too close to your device.
Camera permission required for face detection
Watch this video to learn how VisionProtect works and how to use it effectively.
Connect with us on social media for updates and support.
VisionProtect is designed to help you maintain healthy screen viewing habits. Our mission is to protect your vision in the digital age.
